Description: This program is used to limit the bandwidth to different SCIONLab user-ASes. If there are no user-ASes then no limits will be enforced.

Option2.Description: Limit the bandwidth according to the link info file.

Option4.Description: Show the current TC configurations for all the interfaces available on this machine.

Option5.Description: Update or set the path to the link info file. (The argument must be the valid path to the link info file obtained by the SCIONLab server.)

Option6.Description: Update or set the default bandwidth for interfaces that are used to connect to user-ASes [Kbps]

Example1.Description: Limit the bandwidth according to the link_info.json file.

Example4.Description: Update the path to the link_info.json file, update the default bandwidth and then limit the bandwith according to the link_info.json file.
